Text:
Dutch to English translation
United States
Romance / Science-Fiction
105 minutes
.
directed by George NOLFI
Matt Damon, Emily Blunt and Michael Kelly
.
The ambitious David Norris (Matt Damon) is about to get a seat in the U.S. Senate, but he and gorgeous Sellas Elise (Emily Blunt) meet and a torrid romantic affair begins.His life changes drastically. David soon discovers that they are followed by men on behalf of the mysterious "The Adjustment Bureau", every effort to prevent them to be together.

Alle subs zijn met een hoofdletter.
Je kan beter op de echte versie wachten. Deze is alleen geschikt voor diegenen die echt niet willen wachten.
A: 7
V: 6
Shitty video quality.. Not worth the download.
